title: The Compass Edge Forms
summary: Bazgar, Sabriel, and Marwen first met at the Wayward Compass in Ardenford, traded names and first impressions, and agreed to take their first contract together.

title: Resting Corwin Caldor
summary: The party fought off skeletons, identified Renn’s grandfather, Corwin Caldor, and successfully returned his intact remains to the watchtower. After burying him, they received payment from Renn before seeking further work.

title: Goblin Raid Resolution
summary: The party defeated the goblin ambush, with Marwen incinerating several foes and Sabriel providing healing. They spared one goblin who fled, then returned to the farmer to receive payment and bonus cheese for the rescued sheep, concluding the job.

title: Tavern Brawl with Imperium Traders
summary: After a late-night bonding session, the party faced escalating tensions with Imperium traders. Bazgar initiated a brawl, knocking out several traders before Thorgrim enforced peace with free beer, allowing the party to rest undisturbed.

title: Consultation with Elarion the Elf
summary: Marwen approached Elarion, the elf librarian, to seek guidance on ruins, dwarf guides, and local shops. With valuable directions and recommendations received, the party concluded their conversation and prepared to continue their errands.

title: Confrontation with Giant Spider
summary: The party stealthily approached a web-covered camp, negotiated with a giant spider, and killed a hatching spiderling. After stabilizing a worker, they destroyed the spider eggs, and prepared to return to Ardenford for payment.

title: Shopping and Research in Ardenhaven
summary: The party completed their shopping in Ardenford’s local shops, acquiring items including a discounted Sleep scroll and replacement throwing axes. Marwen stole an uncatalogued holy book during her research at the Concordance Library, successfully evading detection.

title: Mara’s Chase Through the Tunnels
summary: The party hired an Oathhold dwarf guide and reached hidden ancient tunnels, finding a recently used room marked “MARA.” Mara attacked and pursued Marwen; the party fled as the bridge snapped, injuring Bazgar and Marwyn while Mara halted at the chasm.

title: Alarmed Rest and Sabriel’s Return
summary: The party retreated deeper into the ruins, set an Alarm, and took a short rest. Sabriel rejoined them after seemingly teleporting back, and they examined the blank book and noted its unsettling, off-brand magical feel.

title: Marwyn Warned of Mara
summary: Marwyn revealed Mara was a dangerous Elderholt deep witch and explained the difference between ward witches and deep witches and the cost of their bargains. The party accepted the danger and agreed they needed to escape and seek help.

title: Pool Mechanism Unlocked and Drained
summary: After defeating the construct, the party investigated the pool’s purpose and workings. As Mara’s scratching drew near, they released the drain and escaped through the opening.

title: Climb Toward Faint Daylight
summary: Swept through a tunnel, the party reached a cavern shore and found an upward path. They climbed to a higher plateau where faint daylight shone far above.

title: Cinder Appeased, Crow Dispatched
summary: The party negotiated with an offended Cinder and restored working terms. They sent the crow with a note to fetch Kargrimdur and rope.

title: Rope Escape and Extended Camp
summary: After hours passed, Kargrimdur lowered a secured rope and helped the party climb out. They then camped for several days to a week, ate rations, completed long rests, and watched occasional travelers pass.

title: Elder Marith Arrives
summary: The party waited at camp as Elder Marith arrived on Cinder and confirmed Mara was lost with no return. Cinder choose to continue to serve Marwen over returning with Marith.

title: Bazger makes friends
summary: At the writ board, Bazgar fought off an orc attacker before a short human intervened. Two members of the Blacker Ledger.

title: Meeting the Black Ledger
summary: The party fought off the Black Ledger in The Shades, stabilized the injured loan shark, and returned for payment.

title: Framed
summary: The party learned they were framed for the the murder of Calderwick; They prove their innocence to Lord Mayor Ranwald; they learn The Imperium was invovled.

title: Aersiliel
summary: The party avoided Aersiliel and her guards in town. Sabriel meets and greets, Aersiliel shared Elaerith's displeasure.

title: Derro's Warm Welcome
summary: The party was ambushed by a derro foe-party; they party defeats them; there leader retrated into the water passage.

title: Chain Warden Avoided; Fizz Bit Recruited
summary: The party spotted a chain-construct guarding an ancient house and managed to sneak past it. During their escape they found Fizz Bit, a stranded gnome wizard; he agreed to split loot 50/50 in exchange for being saved and joined the party.
